question: Which of the following company plans to expand its operations in the northeast and make Guwahati its regional gateway of the region?
explanation: Jet Airways has announced plans to expand its operations in the northeast and make Guwahati its regional gateway of the region. Jet Airways has increased the number of weekly flights between the northeast and the rest of the country to 184. Jet Airways has introduced non-stop services to Aizawl, Jorhat and Silchar.
